title: Jagged Alliance Flashback v1.0.4 Cracked-3DM
description:
Jagged Alliance Flashback v1.0.4 Cracked-3DM



1.0.4

- Added new in-game usable items to regain hitpoints and/or boost morale, action points and energy: Adrenaline Shot, Regen Boost, Beer, and many more.
- Balancing: Healing over time takes now longer, healing with a Doctor is faster. Also, San Hermanos is now a sunnier place.
- Added "FocusedAimingAPMultiplier" and "SuperAimingAPMultiplier" : 2.0 to GameRuleSettings.json to make it available for modders

Bugfixes

- Enemy attacking Squads now use correct spawn zones
- Level-Up and stats-gain now calculated correctly. If you already leveled up - you should be ok.
- Fixed a bug in Sector C10 when being attacked by AI
- Fixed bug on Mac OSX with non-native resolutions that prevented people from starting in fullscreen
- Fixed prices for Mercs in german translation
- Fixed Glenn trigger happening more than once
- Fixed Krasnodar Trigger for sector clear

1.0.3

Fixed Bug that would cause some old savegames to not load correctly

1.0.2

Improvements
Added German localization
Interrupt mode doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t stop for unit on the beginning of the turn

Bugfixes
Fixed some game-crashing bugs
